ygData.subject: Re: Alliance VS Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Necromancer sees the optic lazers and the rifle firing at him.  He easily dodges the optic lazers but he gets hit in the wing by the rifle shot.

::Necromancer::

       Necromancer sees the optic lazers and the rifle firing at him.  He
easily dodges the optic lazers but he gets hit in the wing by the rifle
shot.

        "AHHHHH!!!!!  I'm hit!!  Medic!!!" He screams as he goes spiraling
downward on an angle, and hits a tree.

        His eyes close, and then suddenly he starts seeing his sister, Hell
Drak.

      "Brother, you're not gonna let a big, Alliance punk like that beat
you, are you??  Get up, and fight, like a Maximal!!!!" She said, and
disappeared.

    Necromancer's eyes opened, and then he got back up on his gigantic feet.
He took a couple gigantic steps over to Dinobot.

      "Dinobot, remember me??  Need a ride back to the CF with Tavatron?
You look badly injured!" He said, calmly.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 20, 2000 9:59 AM
Subject: Re: Alliance VS Maximals


>
> You missed the small but important fact that Prowl is kinda flying 40 feet
or
> so up in the air, Carnage, but we can say he was on the ground.
>
> ::Oblitertron/Prowl::
>
> Prowl's eyes widen as he sees the Oblitercons combine. That was the one
thing
> he hadn't wanted to happen; the giant Alliance gestalt caused too much
death
> and destruction.
>
> A shadow covers Prowl as Dinobot runs up to him, mechfluid spraying over
> Prowl as Dinobot is hit. He swears, glancing back at Oblitertron as
another
> shadow passes over him, this one of Oblitertron's foot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Oblitertron laughs as Dinobot is hit with his optic lasers, bringing a
foot
> down on the two bots. Before the foot has a chance to hit either of them,
> though, a tail smashes into Oblitertron's head, the bot stubling to the
side,
> his foot missing the Maximals by a few feet.
>
> He spins around, firing his rifle and optic lasers at Necromancer.
>
>
>
